ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen pink lemonade concentrate, thawed
4 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles light-flavored beer (such as CoronaÂ®)
4 cups ice cubes, or as desired
ins: Stir lemonade concentrate and vodka together in a large container. Pour beer into the lemonade mixture. Float raspberries into the liquid and gently stir. Serve over ice and garnish with lemon slices.
